item.title: Shortcuts
item.description: I stopped using a mouse years ago and only really use the trackpad for navigating websites or OS gestures. When coding, I prefer to keep my fingers on the keys as much as possible.

item.title: VS Code
item.description: This is the first in a series of posts that detail how I’ve set up my IDE
